name: Oh My Guts
description:
This is our entry for the GMTK Jam 2020.

The theme was "Out of Control" so we decided to apply the theme not only in the game context but in the dev team as well[We switch roles].

You play as Amatista, help her reach the running truck with your uncontrollable shots!

Dev Team

Mateo "Carenalga" Robayo Rodríguez - Audio< 🎵 > and Programmer < 👨‍💻 >

Itzel "Noisy Panda" González Estrada - Art < 🎨 >

Juan "Quiet Gecko" Carlos García Ángel - Programación < 👨‍💻 >

ᕙ༼◕ ᴥ ◕༽ᕗ     \༼◕ ᴥ ◕༽/       _༼◕ ᴥ ◕༽_
